# Installation


While the initial submissions are getting processed, the package can be built usiung the source deposited on this repository.

```
install.packages("https://github.com/adamkocsis/rgplates/raw/main/_archive/source/rgplates_0.2.0.tar.gz", repos=NULL, type="source")
```
